title: Inputs provided by customer on food delivery app

content.question: A student is creating an application that allows customers to order food for delivery from a local restaurant. Which of the following is LEAST likely to be an input provided by a customer using the application?

choices.label: The address where the order should be delivered
The cost of a food item currently available for order
The credit card or payment information for the purchaser
The name of a food item to be included in the delivery

content.answer: The cost of a food item currently available for order

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Generalize data sources through variables.
